document.full_text: leaders of the state house of representatives introduced legislation to allow civil unions for gay couples after conceding there was not enough support in the chamber for a same-sex marriage bill.
document.title: new england: rhode island: civil unions proposed
lines_and_colors: leaders of the state house of representatives introduced legislation to allow civil unions for gay couples after conceding there was not enough support in the chamber for a same-sex marriage bill.
